thread.section_title: Regina Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 5-STAR Customer Service
thread.title_full: 5-STAR Customer Service - Review of Regina Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tl L
title: 5-STAR Customer Service
text:
Myself, my mother, my daughter and my grand daughter visited Paris for Spring Break, for 5 nights, and we stayed at The Regina Hotel.
I chose this property because of the location, 5 star rating, and price.
It exceeded my expectations.
Not only were our rooms beautiful, comfortable and well appointed, but the customer service that we experienced from all of the staff was exceptional!
Our stay was wonderful in every way. The daily breakfast was very good, as well!
The location, right across the street form The Lourve, was very convenient to all of the beautiful sights of Paris.
Again, many thanks to The Regina Hotel staff. They helped to make this trip magical!
